    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 double strokeWeight,
                 java.awt.Color strokeColor,
                 java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Creates a rectangle object
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - is the y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - is the width of the rectangle
        height - is the height of the rectangle
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the lines used to draw the rectangle
        strokeColor - is the color of the lines used to draw the rectangle
        fillColor - is the color that fills the rectangle

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 double strokeWeight,
                 java.awt.Color strokeColor)
        Creates a rectangle object
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - is the y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - is the width of the rectangle
        height - is the height of the rectangle
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the lines used to draw the rectangle
        strokeColor - is the color of the lines used to draw the rectangle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        checks to see if the point passed in is inside the rectangle
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the point you are checking to see if it is inside the rectangle
        y - is the y coordinate of the point you are checking to see if it is inside the rectangle
        Returns:
        boolean true if the point is inside the rectangle, or false if it is not

        Precondition:Â 
        marker cannot be null
